皉字的基本解释

皉
cǐ
白色。
古同“玼”，鲜明；玉色鲜洁。

皉字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cǐ］
［《廣韻》千禮切，上薺，清。］
(1)白色。
(2)同“玼”。玉色鲜明洁白。

皉字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【白字部】　皉； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页787第07
【集韻】此禮切，音泚。白也。一曰色鮮潔。　又淺氏切，音此。與玼同。

皉字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
皉字的起名意思

白色。

皉
Basic explanation of words
皉
cǐ
white.
In the ancient times, the "wine" is bright; the jade color is fresh and clean.
皉
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cǐ］
["Guangyun" Thousands of courtesy cuts, upper water chestnut, Qing. ]
(1) White.
(2) Same as "玼". The jade color is bright and white.
皉
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [Bai Zi Department] 　皉; Kangxi strokes: 10; Page number: Page 787 No. 07
[Jiyun] This courtesy and cut, sound mellow. White also. One said the color is fresh and clean.　Shallow's cut again, sound this. Same as 玼.
